trans-unit.source: Represents an ordered set of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObject"></xref> objects.
The EmbeddedMailObjectsCollection stores references to items that will be embedded in an e-mail message.
The embedded items can be image files such as company logos.
The EmbeddedMailObjectsCollection is used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition.EmbeddedObjects%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition> object.

E-mail messages that allow embedded objects are configurable in the following Web controls by setting their <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition> properties declaratively: - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> > [!NOTE] > The values in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObject> and EmbeddedMailObjectsCollection objects are not stored in view state.
This protects against malicious users discovering path information for your server.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObjectsCollection"></xref> class.
Adds an <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObject"></xref> to the end of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObjectsCollection"></xref> collection.
The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObject"></xref> to add to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObjectsCollection"></xref>.
Returns the index of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObject"></xref> in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObjectsCollection"></xref>.
The specified value is .
Determines whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObjectsCollection"></xref> contains a specific <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObject"></xref>.

Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObjectsCollection.IndexOf%2A> method to identify the position of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObject> in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObjectsCollection>.
The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObject"></xref> to locate in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObjectsCollection"></xref> object.
if the contains obj; otherwise, .
Copies the collection objects to a one-dimensional <xref:System.Array> instance beginning at the specified index in the array.
The one-dimensional <xref:System.Array> is the destination of the elements copied from the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObjectsCollection"></xref>.
The array must have zero-based indexing.
The zero-based index in `array` at which copying begins.
The specified array is .
The specified index is out of range of the collection.
Determines the index of a specific <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObject"></xref> in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObjectsCollection"></xref>.
An <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObject"></xref> to locate in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObjectsCollection"></xref>.
The index of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObject"></xref> if it exists in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObjectsCollection"></xref>; otherwise, -1.

Inserts an <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObject"></xref> into the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObjectsCollection"></xref> object at the specified index position.
If `index` is 0, `value` is added to the beginning of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObjectsCollection>.
If `index` equals the number of items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObjectsCollection>, `value` is appended to the end.
An integer value that indicates the index position at which to insert the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObject"></xref> in the collection.
An <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObject"></xref> object to insert into the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObjectsCollection"></xref>.
The specified index is out of range of the collection.
The specified value is .
Returns a specific element of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObjectsCollection"></xref>, identified by its position.
If `index` does not match an existing member of the collection, an error occurs.
The Item property is the default property for a collection.

Therefore, the following lines of code are equivalent: ```vb# myObject = myCollection(index) myObject = myCollection.Item(index) ``` ```c# myObject = myCollection[index]; myObject = myCollection.Item[index]; ```
The zero-based index of the element to get.
Returns the at the location specified by the index parameter.
index is less than zero.
-or- index is equal to or greater than the number of items in the collection.
To be added.
Removes the first occurrence of the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObject"></xref> from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObjectsCollection"></xref>.
The Remove method uses the information contained in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObject> to identify the item to remove from the collection.
The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObject"></xref> to remove from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObjectsCollection"></xref>.
